title: Just transfered from Na to Lan but cant log in now
body: So i just transfered my main account from Na to Lan (Pr4y), but i do have an existing alt account already on lan(SS@ Ezreal). the thing is they both have the same username and password so now when i try and log into my main on lan it loggs me into my alternate account. is there anyway to fix this because i can not acces my main account anymore.

replies.body: It looks like when you transferred that account since there was already another account there with that username it gave you the option to change it. The username of the account Pr4y is different than what it was on NA. If you don't remember, try using the Forgot my Username option, or hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
